title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB:
When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, I encountered a problem with the 'Close All Saved' feature. To reproduce the issue, I followed these steps: 
1. Close all editors. 
2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. However, nothing happens when I do this.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, please use build 20020508 with the latest UI code and follow these steps: 
1. Close all editors. 
2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
